description.jp:
邪悪な心が１本の樹に宿ったことで
誕生した 暗黒魔道士。
クリスタルの力で封印されていたが 
その力が弱まると各地のクリスタルを
破壊し 復活を遂げる。
以後は「無」の力を求め 何度となく
バッツたちの前に立ち塞がった。
description.gl: A warlock born from the evil souls dwelling inside a single tree. He was sealed by the power of the crystals、 but once that seal began to weaken、 he shattered the crystals and released himself from their prison. Afterward、 he sought the power of the Void and thwarted Bartz and his friends many times on their journey.

jp.text: ファファファ……\n私に逆らう者はこうなるのだ！！
怒りや憎しみで\n私を倒すことはできぬ！
すばらしい！ 見よ この力を！
次元のはざまへ行くがいい！！

gl.text: Mwa-hahahaha! Witness what befalls those who stand against me!
All the hatred in existence would never be enough to defeat me!
Beautiful...beautiful! Look! Gaze upon the unlimited power of the Void!
For your continued bungling、 I banish you from this dimension!

desc.en:
Reduces all enemies' BRV to 0 (except broken ones)
Increases own BRV by 200% of Attack
AoE HP Attack
Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Deals 100% HP damage to all targets
All targets: 6 turns 3 levels of [Bud of Darkness] (limit 3), 3 turns [Dissipating Vortex]
Does not consume use count on next turn (excl. some abilities)
desc.jp:
ブレイク中の敵を除く 敵全体のBRVを0にし
自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを自身に加算
＋全体HP攻撃
加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは等倍
敵全体に6ACTION「暗黒の芽」3段階（上限3）
3ACTION「霧散の渦」付与
使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
（一部のアビリティを除く）

desc.en:
When called for assistance, Exdeath performs the following actions
• All targets: 2 turns 1 level of [Bud of Darkness] (limit 3)
• Reduces all targets' BRV by 350% of own Attack
• Increases own BRV by 350% of own Attack
• AoE HP attack
• BRV reduced, BRV gained increases based on target's [Bud of Darkness] level
　∟ 400% of own Attack at 1
　∟ 450% of own Attack at 2
　∟ 500% of own Attack at 3
• Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
• Cannot inflict BREAK
• All targets: 2 turns [Curse]
desc.jp:
コールされたエクスデスが以下の行動を行う
敵全体に2ACTION「暗黒の芽」1段階付与（上限3）

自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
＋全体HP攻撃
対象の「暗黒の芽」の段階に応じて
自身の攻撃力に依存したBRVを減らす量と
自身の攻撃力に依存したBRV加算量アップ
与えるHPダメージは分配
このアビリティでブレイクは発生しない
敵全体に2ACTION「カーズ」付与

name.jp: ブラックホールエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Black Hole]:
• Increases BRV reduction based on Attack by 50%
• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 50% 
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• [Bud of Darkness] duration +3
• [Incarnation of Ill Intent] duration +4

While [Incarnation of Ill Intent] is active:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Reduces target's BRV by 100% of Attack
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack
　∟ HP Attack
　∟ Cannot inflict BREAK
desc.gl:
When using Black Hole:
 • Moderate boost to BRV reduced based on own ATK
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on own ATK
 • Increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Bud of Darkness duration +3
 • Incarnation of Ill Intent duration +4

While Incarnation of Ill Intent active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (reduces target's BRV based on own ATK before HP attack; increases BRV based on ATK; this ability cannot inflict Break)
desc.jp:
「ブラックホール」使用時
・自身の攻撃力に依存したBRVを減らす量中アップ
・自身の攻撃力に依存したBRV加算量中アップ
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・「暗黒の芽」の3ACTION期間延長
・「邪念の化身」の4ACTION期間延長

「邪念の化身」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
　-HP攻撃前
　　対象のBRVを自身の攻撃力に依存した量で減らし
　　自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
　-このアビリティでブレイクは発生しない

desc.en:
When using [Grand Cross]:
• Increases total BRV reduction based on Attack by 100%
• Increases own BRV gain based on Attack by 100%
• Increases allies BRV gain based on Attack by 20%
• Raises gained BRV overflow limit by 30%

While [Incarnation of Ill Intent], [Arboreal Mysteries] are active
• [BRV Attack+] becomes [BRV Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 60% compared to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Existing [Bud of Darkness] level +1
• [HP Attack+] becomes [HP Attack++]
　∟ Reduces target's BRV by 150% of Attack
　∟ Increases own BRV by 150% of Attack
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
　∟ Cannot inflict BREAK
　∟ Existing [Bud of Darkness] level +1
desc.gl:
When using Grand Cross:
 • Tremendous boost to BRV reduced based on own ATK
 • Tremendous boost to BRV increased based on ATK
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to allies based on own ATK
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be increased in excess of MAX BRV

While Incarnation of Ill Intent and Arboreal Mysteries active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; increases target's active Bud of Darkness level by 1)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (reduces target's BRV based on own ATK; increases own BRV based on ATK before HP attack; increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; this ability cannot inflict Break; increases target's active Bud of Darkness level by 1)
desc.jp:

　「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し

　　「BRV攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も中アップ
　-対象に付与されている「暗黒の芽」の段階を1段階アップ
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が
　「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-HP攻撃前
　　対象のBRVを自身の攻撃力に依存した量で減らし
　　自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
　-加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-このアビリティでブレイクは発生しない
　-対象に付与されている「暗黒の芽」の段階を1段階アップ
